input.excerpt:
```data.R
<|editable_region_start|>
home_away_splits |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    abs_diff = xgd_home - xgd_away,
    .by = squad
  ) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    mean_diff = mean(abs_diff)
  ) |> 
  dplyr::summarise(
    pct_diff = abs_diff/mean_diff,
    .by = squad
  ) |> 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(<|user_cursor_is_here|>))
  

home_away_splits |> dplyr::select(squad, xgd_home, xgd_away)
<|editable_region_end|>
```

variables.name: bvb_summary_stats
variables.value:
Columns:
* season: dbl
* round: int
* gls_for: dbl
* gls_against: dbl
* xg_for: dbl
* xg_against: dbl
* npxg_for: dbl
* npxg_against: dbl
* shots_for: dbl
* shots_against: dbl

variables.name: bvb_possession_stats
variables.value:
Columns:
* season: dbl
* round: int
* touches_for: dbl
* touches_against: dbl
* pen_touches_for: dbl
* pen_touches_against: dbl

variables.name: home_away_splits
variables.value:
Columns:
* squad: chr
* mp_home: dbl
* mp_away: dbl
* xg_home: dbl
* xg_away: dbl
* xgd_home: dbl
* xgd_away: dbl

output:
<|editable_region_start|>
home_away_splits |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    abs_diff = xgd_home - xgd_away,
    .by = squad
  ) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    mean_diff = mean(abs_diff)
  ) |> 
  dplyr::summarise(
    pct_diff = abs_diff/mean_diff,
    .by = squad
  ) |> 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(pct_diff))
  

home_away_splits |> dplyr::select(squad, xgd_home, xgd_away)
<|editable_region_end|>
